snippet: A concert presented by the Austrian Cultural Forum’s Vienna Complex series focused on works by Ernst Krenek, who emigrated to America after his music was suppressed by the Nazis.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews works of Ernst Krenek performed by soprano Ilana Davidson, pianist Mikhail Korzhev and cellist Jing Li at the Austrian Cultural Forum, as part of forum's Vienna Complex series.
lead_paragraph: A concert presented by the Austrian Cultural Forum’s Vienna Complex series focused on works by Ernst Krenek, who emigrated to America after his music was suppressed by the Nazis.

headline.seo: Delving Into Ernst Krenek’s Intimate Compositions
headline.main: Chamber Works of a Chameleon, Sonorous to Surreal
headline.print_headline: Chamber Works of a Chameleon, Sonorous to Surreal
